video.title: World's Wildest City
video.synopsis: This nature series examines the exotic animals who live alongside humans in the city of Manaus, a Brazilian city surrounded by the rain forest.

episodes.synopsis: In the heart of the rainforest, Manaus is a haven for wildlife and a unique species of monkey. Small and shy, the pied tamarin struggles to find food.
episodes.title: Episode 1

episodes.synopsis: Sloths live in patches of jungle, but more are being found on city streets. It is down to wildlife experts to solve the mystery of their migration.
episodes.title: Episode 2

episodes.synopsis: Two famous Amazonian creatures, river dolphins and manatees, live in Manaus, but the two aquatic mammals take very different paths inside the city.
episodes.title: Episode 3

episodes.synopsis: When wild cats enter Manaus, wildlife experts must come to their aid. As the city expands into the rainforest, the number of incidents increases.
episodes.title: Episode 4

episodes.synopsis: As vultures flock to the city, collisions with planes are rising. Specialists act fast to find out what is drawing them and how to keep them safe.
episodes.title: Episode 5

episodes.synopsis: A caiman is found in the shallows of a popular beach, causing panic across the city. Why are the potential man-eaters suddenly coming into the metropolis?
episodes.title: Episode 6

episodes.synopsis: Manaus is full of larger than life nature. Giant river otters patrol waterways, anaconda tread into the suburbs and massive insects come out at night.
episodes.title: Episode 7

episodes.synopsis: The most widespread animal in Manaus -- ants -- cover the urban jungle, but leaf cutter ants rule. Soon they will outnumber people 300,000 to one.
episodes.title: Episode 8

episodes.synopsis: Reptiles in the city often land in trouble. Snakes end up in bedrooms, tortoise by roads. Luckily, the city’s reptile specialists are on hand to help.
episodes.title: Episode 9

episodes.synopsis: Some of the most unusual animals live in the metropolis of Manaus. These weird and wonderful creatures find strange ways to adapt to city life.
episodes.title: Episode 10

episodes.synopsis: In the jungle city, spiders nest in bananas, while scorpions live in plant pots and mosquitoes swarm in armies, wreaking havoc for people and animals.
episodes.title: Episode 11

episodes.synopsis: On the banks of the Rio Negro, a tributary of the Amazon, people share waterways with exotic animals and unusual fish, like the enormous pirarucu.
episodes.title: Episode 12

episodes.synopsis: When the animals of Manaus run into trouble, teams of wildlife experts come to the rescue, helping an array of species from sloths to giant otters.
episodes.title: Episode 13
